comment.author: 74784995@N00
comment._content: This shows the only DC-2 G-AGBH on the BOAC/KLM service from England to Lisbon....winter 1942/1943....also visible a force-landed Bell P-39 Airacobra which went to the F.A.P. and the Shell Aviation fuel truck. Muito obrigado,,Fundacao Calouste Gulbenkian!...Muito obrigado, Bic Laranja Other views of Aeroporto Lisboa from the Novais archive on www.flickr.com/search/?q=aeroporto%20lisboa%20novais
